itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Michael Brandt, the creator of Chicago Fire, Chicago P.D, and Chicago Med. He also wrote "2 Fast 2 Furious", "Wanted", and "3:10 To Yuma".  If you've ever wanted to know what it takes to get a tv series or b...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Michael Brandt, the creator of Chicago Fire, Chicago P.D, and Chicago Med. He also wrote "2 Fast 2 Furious", "Wanted", and "3:10 To Yuma".  If you've ever wanted to know what it takes to get a tv series or big budget film made, this will answer your questions.  Hands down one of the most fascinating guests we've ever had.

description:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Michael Brandt, the creator of Chicago Fire, Chicago P.D, and Chicago Med. He also wrote "2 Fast 2 Furious", "Wanted", and "3:10 To Yuma".  If you've ever wanted to know what it takes to get a tv series or big budget film made, this will answer your questions.  Hands down one of the most fascinating guests we've ever had.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson and Jarred Taylor sit down with Michael Brandt, the creator of Chicago Fire, Chicago P.D, and Chicago Med. He also wrote "2 Fast 2 Furious", "Wanted", and "3:10 To Yuma".  If you've ever wanted to know what it takes to get a tv series or big budget film made, this will answer your questions.  Hands down one of the most fascinating guests we've ever had.
